about_the_game:
Chasing after her assailant, Tashia discovers a bustling market, hidden under a sprawling cotton tree, the Halfway Market.
Quickly realizing that she has lost much more than a cell phone. Tashia is distraught to discover that someone has also stolen her shadow.
She must now find the culprit among the ghostly denizens of the market, learning about their lives before the market, as well as their untimely deaths.



Explore a Hidden World!
Navigate a beautiful world that blends the magical with the mundane.
Explore the various vending stalls as you conduct your investigation.
Visit each location at different times throughout the day as the suspects move about.

Investigate the Halfway Market!
A magical place populated by Duppy, mischievous spirits who trick and teach in equal measure.
Collect clues, uncover mysterious motives and confirm which suspect has the means to conduct this heinous caper!

Solve the Mystery!
Interrogate 7 suspects based on creatures of Myth & Legend.
Once you have your hunch, NAME the suspect. But beware, Named suspects are banished and are removed from the playthrough.
Taking with them valuables clues & hints …
  • Should the correct suspect be selected, the case is solved!
  • If you select the wrong suspect, Tashia has to remain within the Halfway Market and continue with the case!
